iep_goals: Recall and apply learned information after 48-hour intervals with 70% accuracy using memory strategies
Demonstrate improved processing speed on timed academic tasks with 60% improvement from baseline
accommodations: Extended time for all assessments (double time)
learning_styles: needs frequent review and repetition of concepts

disabilities.name: acquired brain injury from motor vehicle accident

interviews.parent: Parent reports Destiny is working hard to regain academic skills after her accident. She wants to finish high school and attend college.
interviews.teacher: Destiny shows remarkable determination and has made steady progress in rebuilding her academic abilities.

observations.psychologist: Recovering cognitive function with particular challenges in memory and processing speed. Strong motivation for rehabilitation.
